bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("Update Requests/"+playerName+".txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+" Has requested a update !"); bw.newLine(); bw.write("What Rule = "+rule); bw.newLine(); bw.write(receivedPlayerName+""); bw.newLine(); bw.newLine(); bw.write("===================="); bw.newLine(); bw.write("rule 0 = update request"); bw.newLine(); bw.write("rule 1 = mod appeal"); bw.newLine(); bw.write("rule 2 = admin appeal"); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); sendMessage("Thank-You , we received your update request!"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+" : requested rule=" +rule);
